about_the_game:
If you're interested, be sure to Wishlist the game - that helps a lot!


It will be a journey from scratch where you'll need to take care of your farm with a lot of hard work while striving to reestablish the city's guild to earn recognition and respect. Throughout this journey, you'll have the opportunity to engage in various exciting adventures and interact with the local residents, each with unique personalities and incredible stories to discover.

MANAGE YOUR OWN FARM

Turn an empty piece of land into a charming farm through planting, harvesting, and animal husbandry! In Rabbit's Fall, our approach to farming is both straightforward and efficient, offering land spaces with up to 9 slots for your various crops. Enjoy an agile and direct process to cultivate your own farm.

RESTORE THE GUILD

Rebuild the city's guild by collecting and combining resources, work hard for its restoration, and open the doors for new adventurers to join. Restore the honor and prestige that once made Rabbit's Foot guild a reference and participate in annual tournaments, facing other guilds from the continent to solidify your renown.

EXERCISE CREATIVITY

Customize your house and turn it into a true cozy home! Leave your unique mark by creating a variety of furniture, decorations, and unique enhancements. Make each room tell your story through special touches that reflect your personality and style.

BE PART OF THE COMMUNITY

Welcome to the captivating community of Whale Harbor! Here, you'll find a gallery of memorable characters, each with distinct personalities, engaging routines, and captivating stories to share. Explore the richness of their lives and who knows, maybe even discover the spark of romance in the air? Join in seasonal and yearly events. Join us in uncovering the wonders that Whale Harbor has to offer.

FIND A SPECIAL SOMEONE

Meet the singles who are in search of love! Build relationships, find the right person, and win their heart; take them on dates. And when you prefer, start a new chapter of your story, build a family, have children, and watch them grow alongside your partner.

EXPLORE THE WORLD

Enter the city of Whale Harbor and immerse yourself in its history, uncovering its hidden secrets. Discover the fate of the great hero and unravel the events that led to the fall of Rabbit's Foot Guild. Additionally, various dungeons await you nearby, each with its own puzzles to be solved.

CHOOSE YOUR CLASS

Embark on your adventures as a relentless Mage, perhaps an exceptionally skilled Swordsman. Maybe you'll embody a rock-solid Crusader, a wise and virtuous Cleric, or a cunning and stealthy Thief. Regardless of your class, your journey will be epic.

BATTLE AND CONQUER

Confront the remnants of the Demon King that roam uncontested throughout the continent, supported by your valiant guild companions. Challenge formidable creatures, enter the mysterious dungeons surrounding Whale Harbor, explore every corner of them, and triumph over the formidable bosses guarding the floors. Elevate your group and guild's reputation, achieving victories that will echo throughout the land.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS

The game was designed from the ground up with a focus on multiplayer mode, allowing a maximum of 4 players. Players will have complete freedom to embark on their own adventures, purchase properties, build relationships, form their own teams, and much more. There will be no need to rely solely on the game host, as each player will have the autonomy to carry out their actions and progress individually.

name: Rabbit's Fall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: It will be a journey from scratch where you'll need to tend to your farm with a lot of hard work while striving on a mission to reestablish the city's guild for gaining recognition and respect.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
